History<\/h2>

Mario<\/a> was the creation of Shigeru Miyamoto<\/a> back in 1981. Since then he has been one of the most recognizable figures in video games to this day. He has inspired games, movies, cartoon shows and is still going strong. He has even branched out from his platform gaming origins into several new franchises, such as Mario Tennis<\/a><\/em>, Mario Party<\/a><\/em>, Mario RPG<\/a><\/em>, Mario Kart<\/a><\/em> and more.<\/p>
